column4: how simple is it to upgrade from debian sarge to dapper drake for example? Obviously the principle is as simple as changed the apt sources file, but are the packages named with the same conventions etc?
I would have thought that you would need to do a fresh install

not an expert on it, and although Ubuntu is based on debian I am not sure that you can simple upgrade from one distro to another, never heard of that being done, in fact a lot would probable recommend a fresh install when moving from Breezy to Dapper
